title.narrative: Democratic Republic of Congo - Statistics and Public Finance Institutional Support Project (PAI-STATFIN)
République Démocratique du Congo - Projet d’appui institutionnel en statistique et aux finances publiques (PAI-STATFIN)

description.narrative: Les principaux bénéficiaires directs du projet sont les administrations. La zone du projet est Kinshasa, et le reste du pays. Les bénéficiaires indirects du projet sont les populations du pays dans son ensemble. Celles-ci tireront parti de l’amélioration des conditions de vie rendue possible par la stabilité macroéconomique, une gestion budgétaire plus efficiente donnant la priorité aux dépenses pro-pauvres.

The main direct beneficiaries of the project are administrative bodies. The project area is Kinshasa and the rest of the country. The project’s indirect beneficiaries are the country’s entire population, which will benefit from the improvement in living conditions made possible by macroeconomic stability and more efficient budget management prioritizing pro-poor spending.

La finalité du projet est de contribuer à renforcer les capacités institutionnelles de l’Etat en matière de pilotage de l’économie et à consolider la gestion des finances publiques. L’objectif spécifique du projet est de développer d’une part, un système statistique national permettant de disposer de données fiables et à jour sur les objectifs de développement, de mesurer les résultats et impacts des programmes et projets soutenant l’action du gouvernement, de suivre et d’évaluer la mise en œuvre des politiques et des réformes économiques et d’autre part, de renforcer l’efficacité des systèmes et mécanismes institutionnels de recouvrement des redevances minières et ceux nécessaires à plus de transparence et de responsabilité dans la gestion des finances publiques en général.

The project goal is to help build the State’s institutional capacity to manage the economy and consolidate the management of public finances. The project’s specific objectives are to (i) develop a national statistical system that will provide reliable and updated data on development objectives; (ii) measure the outcomes and impacts of projects and programmes supporting the Government’s actions; (iii) monitor and evaluate implementation of economic policies and reforms and, (iv) enhance the efficacy of institutional systems and mechanisms for the collection of mining taxes and those required to improve transparency and accountability in public financial management in general.

Le projet d’appui institutionnel en statistique et aux finances publiques (PAI-STATFIN) a été conçu car l’infrastructure de production statistique est vétuste ou quasi inexistante et la production statistique nécessite une relance urgente. De plus, il est essentiel que le pays relève les défis qui minent la gouvernance économique et financière sur le plan central en général et en province en particulier. A travers le renforcement des capacités institutionnelles de la Direction générale des recettes administratives, domaniales, judiciaires et de participation (DGRAD), le PAI-STATFIN devrait directement contribuer à la mobilisation des ressources domestiques et à l’augmentation de la contribution de la DGRAD au Budget national. Le coût total du projet, droits de douane et taxes compris, est estimé à 10,96 millions d’UC, dont 7,092 millions d’UC en devises (64,71%) et 3,86759 millions d’UC en monnaie locale (35,29%). Le projet se décline en trois composantes qui sont (i) l'appui en statistique (ii) l'appui aux finances publiques et (iii) la gestion et coordination du projet.

The statistics and public finance institutional support project (PAI-STATFIN) is designed because the statistical production infrastructure is obsolete or virtually non-existent and statistical production needs to be urgently revived. In addition, it's essential for the country to address the challenges which are undermining economic and financial governance at the central level in general and in the provinces, in particular. By building the institutional capacity of Directorate General of Administrative, State Lands, Judicial, and Participation Revenue (DGRAD), PAI-STATFIN should directly contribute to the mobilization of domestic resources and an increase in DGRAD’s contribution to the national budget. The total project cost including taxes and customs duties is estimated at UA 10.96 million comprising UA 7.092 million in foreign exchange (64.71%) and UA 3.86759 million in local currency (35.29%). The project is broken down into the following three components: (i) statistics support (ii) public finance support and (iii) project management and coordination.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

receiver-org.narrative: GOUVERNEMENT DE REPUBLIQUE DEMOCRATIQUE DU CONGO MINISTERE DES FINANCES BUDGET

title.narrative: Number of Treasury Management and Payment Authorization Directorate (DTO) employees and executive staff trained
Increase in Directorate General of Administrative, State Lands, Judicial, and Participation Revenue (DGRAD) revenue
Number of Financial Reporting Directorate (DRGC) employees and executive staff trained on accounting and financial data collection techniques
Number of Financial Reporting Directorate (DRGC) employees provided with equipment at central level
Number of people trained under the Computerized Monitoring and Evaluation System (CMES)
Number of Financial Reporting Directorate (DRGC) employees and executive staff trained on the consolidation of Treasury accounts and sub-accounts
Number of Provincial Statistical Production Centre (CPPS) rehabilitated
Growth and Poverty Reduction Strategy Paper (GPRSP) monitoring and evaluation system mainstreaming gender established

actual.value: A capacity building mission for the Control and Monitoring Department of the Ministry of Planning was carried out by an International Consultant expert in Monitoring and Evaluation (Target achievement rate: 100 %)

title.narrative: Production of the State budget management account is more reliable

target.value: Credible presentation of accounts certified by the Court of Auditors and opinion of the Court of Auditors within the constitutional deadline by end 2015

actual.value: According to the Financial Reporting Directorate (DRGC)’s 2016 report, financial reporting for 2015 and 2016 was considered more reliable (Target achievement rate: 70%)

title.narrative: Establishment of electronic archiving system for the Treasury Management and Payment Authorization Directorate (DTO)

target.value: Establishment of an electronic archiving system by June 2015

actual.value: An operational electronic archiving system has been available since 2017 (Target achievement rate: 100 %)

title.narrative: Time taken to produce statistical yearbooks

target.value: Yearbook for year n published in the first half of year n+3 in 2015 and n+2 in 2016

actual.value: Delays in the publication of reports vary between 2 and 3 years in 2019 instead of 10 years (Target achievement rate: 100 %)

title.narrative: Level of computerisation of DGRAD’s services and procedures

target.value: The revenue collection process computerised as from March 2015

actual.value: IT and energy equipment were installed (Target achievement rate: 75 %)

title.narrative: Time taken to produce national accounts

target.value: Final national accounts for year n published in n+3 in 2015 and n+2 in 2016

actual.value: In 2019 (With project support, the National Institute of Statistics produced the 2014 national accounts in 2017, or in n+3 - Target achievement rate: 100%)

title.narrative: Statistical production in the areas targeted by the project with gender mainstreaming

target.value: Excellent quality and timely publications with genderrelated data

actual.value: Reliable and good quality statistical publications in 2018 (Target achievement rate: 100 %)

title.narrative: Time taken to produce the business register

target.value: The first register produced and updated every 2 years

actual.value: The first business register should be finalised in the 1st quarter of 2020 (Target achievement rate: 50 %)

title.narrative: Production of a mining tax collection procedures manual

target.value: The procedures manual of a mining tax collection is prepared and applicable from March 2015

actual.value: The procedures manual is prepared but awaiting validation (Target achievement rate: 50 %)

title.narrative: Time taken to produce quarterly notes mainstreaming gender

target.value: Note of quarter n in the first month of quarter n+3 in 2015 and n+2 in 2016

actual.value: The project facilitated the production of three gender thematic bulletins for 2016 (Target achievement rate: 100 %)

title.narrative: Time taken to produce half-yearly notes mainstreaming gender

target.value: Note of semester n in the first month of semester n+3 in 2015 and n+2 in 2016

actual.value: The project facilitated the production of three gender thematic bulletins for 2016 (Target achievement rate: 100 %)

title.narrative: Time taken to produce monthly notes mainstreaming gender

target.value: Notes of month n in the first two weeks of month n+3 in 2015 and n+2 in 2016

actual.value: The project facilitated the production of three gender thematic bulletins for 2016 (Target achievement rate: 100 %)

title.narrative: Conduct of a study on the technological resources required to control declarations by mining companies on humidity levels in marketable mining products

target.value: The study to identify the technological resources required to check humidity levels in marketable mining products is conducted by end 2014

actual.value: The study is not yet available (Target achievement rate: 50 %)
